title: Estimate the SGD volume. — estimate_sgd
Estimate the SGD volume. — estimate_sgd
text: inputData data frame containing input data model. calibratableParams list calibratable parameters. constParams list constant parameters. windowSize integer indicating period want average recharge.

title: Estimate the SGD volume. — estimate_sgd
text: data frame containing estimated SGD volume.

title: Estimate the SGD volume. — estimate_sgd
text: Estimate SGD volume based Strack (1976) analytical solution. inputData data.frame containing required columns model (R, E0, Pumping, GWL, H2O_SB1, H2O_SB2). R numeric vector daily precipitation (mm). E0 numeric vector daily potential evapotranspiration (mm). Pumping numeric vector daily pumping rate (m3/d). GWL numeric vector initial groundwater level (mm), first value used initial value SB1. H2O_SB1 numeric vector initial water level first soil bucket (mm). first value used initial value SB1. H2O_SB2 numeric vector inital water level second soil bucket (mm). first value used initial value SB2. calibratableParams list calibratable parameters. recommended use json_to_paramter_list create list. windowSize list constant parameters. recommended use json_to_paramter_list create list.

title: SGDr (development version)
text: package totally re-constructed using OOP. Now 2 classes Model Parameters, respectively. achieved results efficiency applying changes. However extensibility much larger. Model class Parameters class still development.
